#include <cstdio>
#include <cstring>
#include <string>
#include <algorithm>
using namespace std;

const int MAXC = 1000010;

char pal[MAXC];

int ff[MAXC];

int main (){
    scanf("%[^\n]", pal);
    int tam = strlen(pal);
    for(int a=tam;a>0;a--){
        pal[a]=pal[a-1];
    }
    ff[0]=ff[1]=0;
    int mp=0;
    for(int a=2;a<=tam;a++){
        int aa=a-1;
        while(aa!=0 && pal[a]!=pal[ff[aa]+1])
            aa=ff[aa];
        if(pal[a]==pal[ff[aa]+1])
            ff[a]=ff[aa]+1;
        else
            ff[a]=0;
        mp=max(mp,ff[a]);
    }
    int pri=-1, seg=-1;
    for(int a=mp+1;a<=tam;a++){
        if(ff[a]==mp){
            if(pri==-1)
                pri=a;
            else{
                seg=a;
                break;
            }
        }
    }
    //printf("%d %d %d\n", mp, pri, seg);
    if(mp!=0 && seg!=-1)
        printf("YES\n%d\n", pri-mp);
    else
        printf("NO\n");
    return 0;
}
